function_call.name: classify_risks_PESTLE
function_call.arguments: {"sorted_risks":[{"name":"Complex environmental aspects may impact virus transmission dynamics within the building.","category":"Environmental risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Economic costs to businesses and people due to social distancing measures","category":"Economic risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Disputes exist between unprocessed, crafted, and synthetic natural materials","category":"Environmental risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Virus transmission via air circulation","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Lack of control over thermal exchanges and absence of fault-detection and diagnostics platform pose risks for maintaining indoor air quality and temperature regulation.","category":"Infrastructure risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Lack of access to urban green spaces leading to overcrowding in existing spaces","category":"Social risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Lack of training and network-related capital in inter-agency governance","category":"Social risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Participants of the study classified into different groups of physical activity may have different levels of exposure to contagious diseases based on their activity levels.","category":"Social risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Dependence of virus stability on temperature","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Rapid sharing of information leading to quick action","category":"Social risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Possibility of a rebound to pre-pandemic ways leading to increased transmission of contagious diseases.","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Differences in wastewater composition affecting bioindicator utilization","category":"Environmental risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Middle density and intermediate housing in residential areas","category":"Social risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Significant drops in energy and electricity demand due to pandemic-related closures","category":"Economic risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Underestimation risk","category":"Economic risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Limitation of not measuring viral aerosol particle size directly.","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Optimization of resource consumption in urban areas through big data and computational risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Limited accessibility of healthcare data to a select group of users may raise concerns of data equity and inclusivity.","category":"Data Privacy and Security risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Lack of training in ecosystems and environmental issues for top management in public services","category":"Social risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Use of chlorine in wastewater treatment system","category":"Environmental risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Low dcr leading to a temporary halt in case increase","category":"Political
